item.title: How to write a minimal code editor
item.description: Writing a code editor is a complex task. But what if there was an alternative approach for simpler use cases?

item.title: Automated Release on GitHub Actions
item.description: Releasing an npm package usually has a lot of steps. This is a guide to setting up automated releases for npm packages on GitHub Actions using release-it.
